title: GGS teacher watched student in shower
content:
A Geelong Grammar School teacher allegedly sexually abused a student and watched another boy as he showered, an inquiry has heard. 

Former Geelong Grammar principal John Lewis said Andrew MacCulloch had three relationships with students that ended up with the pupil or his parents expressing concerns about being `crowded' by the teacher and house tutor. 

"I understood that something complicated and puzzling was going on but it did not appear to take the form of physical abuse," Mr Lewis told the child abuse royal commission on Wednesday.
